p: Just as importantly, this set of recommendations may be considered a template for analogous studies in the contemporary “omics” fields in which large panels of analytes or analytical features are intended as indicators of phenotype. Fatty acid panels are among the first routinely measured and reported big data panels, with hundreds of studies published by 1960 ( 3) and at a pace accelerating through the years. The refinements of careful researchers over the decades should be built upon to enable the resolution of modern issues in the health sciences.
